origin: If the given file does not exist, it will be created. Otherwise, it is open for read and write.

origin: Then, we create the subgroup named

Note that before creating a subgroup, we have to make sure that its parent group exists. Otherwise, an error will occur.

origin: In the end, we have to close the file
local: 最后，我们必须关闭文件
